s.text: Last week, the WP ran a front-page story about the problems under welfare reform faced by a woman fresh off the rolls whose 15-year-old daughter has had two babies in rapid succession.
Last week, the WP ran a front-page story about the problems under welfare reform faced by a woman fresh off the rolls whose 15-year-old daughter has had two babies in rapid succession.

In discussing crowd size, the Post uses as a reference the size of the Million Man March, but, curiously, doesn't refer to the Promise Keepers rally of a few weeks back--even though the paper gave PK massive front-page coverage.

All have seen family members harassed, even persecuted to death."
